title: Coastal Hilton Getaway with Executive Lounge Access
description: Discover South Africa’s third-largest city - with its golden beaches and alluring fusion of Afro-Indian culture - staying at the iconic Hilton Durban. Enjoy a five-star oasis in a captivating cosmopolitan city perched on South Africa’s sparkling coastline and indulge in exclusive access to the Executive Lounge and all its benefits; including daily breakfast buffet, nightly canapes and alcoholic drinks, daily high tea and all-day refreshments.
offer_address: 12-14 Walnut Rd, Durban Central, Durban, 4001, South Africa
